title: Plate VII from "Nella Venuta in Roma di Madama LeComte e dei Signori Watelet e Copette"
marks:

LRC, in the plate: [20.]; below ima
description: man and woman being lead by a figure wearing draped garments and a feathered helmet; boat and bridge, LLC; clouds (of smoke?) in middle ground; pair of snakes, LRC; putti with anchor, LLC; putti with a pallet (?), top center
